title: Mandon (G.)
body: Distinguished French botanist, well known for the highly valuable botanical collections he organized in the Madeira archipelago and Bolivia. He was in Madeira from 1865 to 1866, and his collections served as the basis for a work by Cosson on the flora of the Madeira archipelago.

Bolivia: Country where he organized highly valuable botanical collections.

1865: Year in which he was in the island.
1866: Year in which he was in the island.
